S

saveGame() - Method in class mancala.ControllerMancala
Open a file chooser to save the current state of the game.
sendConfirm(String) - Method in class mancala.SocketManager
Send a request to the server confirming or not the previous move done.
sendContinue() - Method in class mancala.SocketManager
Send a request to the server to continue to the next round
sendDifficulty(String) - Method in class mancala.SocketManager
Send a request to the server containing the difficulty mode chosen for the incoming game.
sendLoad(String) - Method in class mancala.SocketManager
Send a request to the server to load a particular loaded board.
sendMove(String) - Method in class mancala.SocketManager
Send a request to the server containing the index of the hole which the move comes from.
sendNewGame() - Method in class mancala.SocketManager
Send a request to the server to start a new game.
sendReset() - Method in class mancala.SocketManager
Send a request to the server to reset the game.
sendSurrend() - Method in class mancala.SocketManager
Send a request to the server to surrender a round.
sendUsername(String) - Method in class mancala.SocketManager
Send a request to the server containing the username of the player.
ServerOutputController - Class in mancala
Class which is used to parse each request sent by the server.
ServerOutputController(String) - Constructor for class mancala.ServerOutputController
ServerOutputController constructor, initializes boolean values to false and call the method to parse the JSON output.

Class managing the output and input of the socket to communicate with the server.
